title: Ep. 624 Be Very Careful: The Dems Are About to Change Their Attack Strategy
description:
Welcome our new sponsor, and use promo code “Dan” for free shipping.

The Democrats are testing a new strategy for their anti-Trump attacks.

It’s way past time for the Never-Trump crowd to acknowledge that they’ve failed.

This is an astonishing account of the liberal media’s ever-changing “collusion” narrative.

Former Obama advisers are losing their minds over Trump’s forceful approach to the Iran protests.

Critics said the Trump International Hotel would lose money. Here’s what really happened.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
